titleStmt.title: Two queries worthy of serious consideration, concerning the gospel faith of the lord Jesus the Christ once given unto the saints, Matth. 16. 16. I Ioh. 5.1.
titleStmt.author: Cornwell, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Februar. 17. 1645 [i.e. 1646]. Francis Cornvvel.
Imprint from Wing, which has publication date: 1645/6.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
